channel.title: CVE Feed for Sentrifugo -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sentrifugo -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-29879|2024-03-21T13:51:40.293Z -- Sentrifugo -- Sentrifugo
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Sentrifugo 3.2, through /sentrifugo/index.php/index/getdepartments/format/html, 'business_id' parameter. The exploitation of this vulnerability could allow a remote user to send a specially crafted URL to the victim and steal their session data.

item.title: CVE-2024-29875|2024-03-21T13:48:16.943Z -- Sentrifugo -- Sentrifugo
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in Sentrifugo 3.2, through /sentrifugo/index.php/default/reports/exportactiveuserrpt, 'sort_name' parameter. The exploitation of this vulnerability could allow a remote user to send a specially crafted query to the server and extract all the data from it.

item.title: CVE-2024-29874|2024-03-21T13:48:04.330Z -- Sentrifugo -- Sentrifugo
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in Sentrifugo 3.2, through /sentrifugo/index.php/default/reports/activeuserrptpdf, 'sort_name' parameter. The exploitation of this vulnerability could allow a remote user to send a specially crafted query to the server and extract all the data from it.
